title: Madrid Derby Dance Party
description:
The FC crew debate whether or not Vinicius Junior should stop celebrating goals and show-boating for fear of retribution ahead of this weekend's Madrid derby at Atletico Madrid. Plus, was Ansu Fati's ommission from the Spanish National Team justified? And should Antonio Conte drop Son Heung-Min from Tottenham's starting XI?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Vinicius Junior's celebration conundrum; Ansu Fati's Spain omission; Antonio Conte's Son problem
